summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Paul Morris and Amanda Kirby regarding a meeting agenda. It includes mentions of confirming details with Barry Bloom's office and addresses scheduling issues related to Caroline Kitidis. The document highlights internal communication within Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
